code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useSelector,useDispatch}from"react-redux";import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import InputPostComment from"../components/InputPostComment";import PostCardBody from"../components/PostCardBody";import PostCardFooter from"../components/PostCardFooter";import PostCardHeader from"../components/PostCardHeader";import PostComments from"../components/PostComments";import{getPostsingle}from"../redux/actions/postActions";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Post=()=>{const[post,setpost]=useState([]);const{auth,detailPost}=useSelector(state=>state);const{id}=useParams();const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getPostsingle({detailPost,auth,id}));if(detailPost.length>0){const newPost=detailPost.filter(item=>item._id===id);setpost(newPost);}},[detailPost,auth,id,dispatch]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:'600px',maxWidth:'100%',margin:'auto'},children:post&&post.length>0&&post.map(pos=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"postCards",style:{backgroundColor:'white',padding:'1rem',marginTop:'1rem',borderRadius:'10px',boxShadow:'3px 3px 5px gray',width:'500px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostCardHeader,{pos:pos}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostCardBody,{pos:pos}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostCardFooter,{pos:pos}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostComments,{pos:pos}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputPostComment,{pos:pos})]}))});};export default Post;
